Pre-Game Insights: Both teams are in good form and the match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka in the Super 4 stage is expected to be a close contest.
Pakistan's Mohammad Rizwan is the highest run scorer in the tournament with a strong batting lineup including Fakhar Zaman, Iftikhar Ahmed, and Khushdil Shah.
Sri Lanka's Kusal Mendis is the highest run scorer for the team with a solid batting order including Pathum Nissanka and Bhanuka Rajapaksa.
Pakistan's bowlers, led by Shadab Khan and Haris Rauf, have been effective in the tournament, while Sri Lanka's bowlers have also performed well as a unit.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is the last of the Super 4 stage before the finals in the Asia Cup 2022.
The head-to-head statistics show Pakistan leading with 13 wins compared to Sri Lanka's 8 wins.
